Notes.Text:
This update for dpdk fixes the following issues:

- Fixed a regression caused by incomplete fix for CVE-2022-2132 (bsc#1219187).

Vulnerabilities.Description: A permissive list of allowed inputs flaw was found in DPDK. This issue allows a remote attacker to cause a denial of service triggered by sending a crafted Vhost header to DPDK.
